translated: The Chapter with the Noble Ones
The one with the dust-colored eyes,

analyzed: ekattise itas kappe  sikhī lokagga nāyako  uppannaḥ loka pajjotaḥ
translated: Twenty-one eons ago, 🔽the world’s leader named Sikhi, 🔽the light of the world arose,
the Victor, the refuge of the world.
In the delightful city of Aruṇa,
I went to a terrible hell,
After passing away from there, I was reborn among humans,
I was not freed from that evil,
like one who has eaten bad poison.
in the teaching of the Victor Kassapa;
By the result of that action,
I was reborn in the city of Dīpa.
In my last existence,🔽I was miraculously born;
Born from the branch of an Āmalakī tree,
I went forth in the Jina’s Dispensation;
I have attained the unshakable state,
I have power over the supernormal powers,
Through the purification of the divine ear;
I have power over the knowledge of others’ minds,
There is no more of this worldly existence.
In the meaning, the Dhamma, the phrasing,
And in ready speech, just so;
My knowledge is spotless and pure,
By the power of the best Buddha.
Welcome indeed it was for me,
The Buddha’s instruction has been fulfilled.
The Buddha’s instruction has been fulfilled.”

original: Itthaṁ sudaṁ ambapāli bhikkhunī imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
